text: Kalbe Sadiq (22 June 1939 - 24 November 2020) was an Islamic scholar, reformer, educator, philanthropist and preacher. He was born in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. He gave lectures mostly in the Islamic month of Muharram.US deports Kalbe Sadiq to Britain - DAWN.COM He founded the Tauheedul Muslimeen Trust on 18 April 1984 that provided educational aid to poor students, And also provided poor families with groceries required in day to day life. dr.Kalbe Sadiq died on 24 November 2020 at a hospital in Lucknow from pneumonia caused by colorectal cancer, aged 81.AIMPLB vice president Maulana Kalbe Sadiq passes away in Lucknow ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian educators Category:Indian philanthropists Category:People from Lucknow
